arts.ttl: Italy’s Finest Gear Up for Champions League Glory: Inter, Milan & Juventus Lead the Charge
arts.sum: The 2024/25 Champions League season is around the corner, with five Serie A teams looking to take the title back to Italy after 15 years. The last Italian club to conquer the most prestigious European tournament was Inter, doing so in their famous treble-winning 2009/10 campaign under Jose Mourinho. The post Italy’s Finest Gear Up for Champions League Glory: Inter, Milan & Juventus Lead the Charge appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.
